attributes.action: intensify measures to prevent terror and catch and punish terrorists.  It's better to be surveilled and alive and alive than free and dead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many individuals and bodies urging citizens to be afraid of those whose job is to protect the public from harm.  As an average citizen, I  salute and support our security forces, our one and only protectors.  I do not support, indeed I deeply distrust bodies like 'Liberty' because I see nothing that they advocate as protecting me from harm rather than protecting those who wish me harm, all in the name of so-called 'human rights'.  God save us from such protectors.
